name: i drew this because i was bored (LD35)
name_original: i drew this because i was bored (LD35)
description:
My first Ludum Dare game, created for LD35.

In "i drew this because i was bored" you play as a little doodle who can shapeshift. Change shape to get through the levels. But watch out. The sinister being behind your existence might grow bored of you...

Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right Arrows - Move

Z - Transform
